location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter to John Beaumont and George Green, Factors at Bushire from William Digges LaTouche and George Abraham at Bussora (Basra)

mods.abstract: Letter reports that LaTouche and Abraham will now proceed to Bussora [Basra]. A number of documents and items that shall be left in the care of Bushire are listed and other matters related to their departure are also discussed.
